scenario.name: REGISTER Test
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:kamailio.local SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:test@kamailio.local>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:test@kamailio.local> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:test@[local_ip]:[local_port]> User-Agent: SIPp Test Client Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0
